title: Rachel Rising, Volume 4: Winter Graves
description: Aunt Johnny lies dead in a mortuary, Manson is buried under the snowstorm of the century and Jet is possessed by a 15-year-old boy from the 1600s. Rachel can save them all, if she can find the spell chest she buried 300 years ago. But first, she must learn the truth about her troubled past. This new volume collects issues #19 to 24 of Terry Moore's critically acclaimed series.
author: Terry Moore
